project.name: inbaversim
project.title: InbaverSim
project.short-description: An OMNeT++ model to simulate CCN-based networks
project.long-description: This version of InbaverSim requires INET 4.5 and OMNeT++ 6.1 or later. Make sure that INET 4.5 is already properly installed in your workspace before attempting to install.
